title: President Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to Attend the World War II Battle of the Bulge 75th Anniversary Commemoration Events â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
December 12, 2019
President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to the Kingdom of Belgium and the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg to the World War II Battle of the Bulge 75th Anniversary Commemoration Events on December 16, 2019.The Honorable Dr. Mark T. Esper, Secretary of Defense, will lead the delegation.Members of the Presidential Delegation:The Honorable J. Randolph Evans, United States Ambassador to the Grand Duchy of LuxembourgThe Honorable Ronald J. Gidwitz, United States Ambassador to the Kingdom of BelgiumGeneral Mark A. Milley, Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of StaffThe Honorable Kay Bailey Hutchison, United States Permanent Representative to the North Atlantic Treaty OrganizationMr. David J. Urban, Chairman of the American Battle Monuments Commission
